question: some people fail in school, but end up being successful in life why fo you think that is the case? What is the most important thing to succeed in life?
text: In this Neoteric epoch, a myriad of Denizens abortive at the school days. However, eventually, they succeed in life. This essay will depict the background, along with the most crucial precursor, concomitantly.

First of all, ridicule from friends and got some motivations are the primary reasons why these people crave to evolve. When their fellows mock them, they ought to vengeance. Therefore, they work hard to prove that they are unwavering. Thus, the fruits that they assembled are the victory and some money. Thereupon, the motivational speech can make people realize that life is not always stable, and enticing them to be creative and diligent because these are the most vital point to succeed.

Moreover, endeavour trait is the most influential why the commoners become successful. When some residents never forfeit, although they have experienced plenty of defeat, they surely will reach the summit. Because when they keep moving forward, there will be a plethora of chances that inflicted. Furthermore, although some people fancy to avoid a risky determination, taking this judgment is not a pernicious idea because it is an undeniable fact that there are plenty of successful men that were born with this determination. Growing the reading habit is also vital for being a success. By reading a book, the cognizance that people have is aggrandizing because most of the cognizance is discovered in a book.
In conclusion, irrespective of their negligence during school, when they keep endeavour and revenge the ridicule, it is not impossible to be successful people.
